column4: sorry for the repost: How is the combination these days for Intel GMA x3100 and Compiz fusion? I read about lots of problems getting it to work. I was wondering if it's working out of the box now after you've installed the compiz-config settings manager?
i'm getting a second had HP laptop with this chip and was wondering if I could get it work easily
compiz is the major source of problems, you should uninstall it
i have it working now on a ATI card... works like a charm and i kinda like it now....
